article: This is Cara and Ben. They are twins . They are twelve. This is their bedroom. It's a nice room. There are two beds in the room. The yellow bed is Cara's and that green one is Ben's. The twins have one desk and two chairs. The chairs look the same . Cara's jacket is on his bed. Ben's coat is on his chair. Their clock, books and pencil-cases are on the desk. Their school bags are behind the chairs.
questions: Cara's _ is yellow and Ben's _ is green.
options: Their two beds look the same.
Their school bags are under the chairs.
They live in the same room.
